MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G42 postcode area of Glasgow affecting properties on Battlefield Road and surrounding streets. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9.45pm to disconnect a generator and re-connect to mains supply and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.19pm on Wednesday 16th December 2020.
